## defineAction() function

Defines an action with the given config and registers it in the registry.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function defineAction<I extends z.ZodTypeAny, O extends z.ZodTypeAny, M extends Record<string, any> = Record<string, any>>(config: ActionParams<I, O, M> & {
    actionType: ActionType;
}, fn: (input: z.infer<I>) => Promise<z.infer<O>>): Action<I, O>;
```
